The Battle of Jihad (), fought between Iranian Arabs and British Empiretook place near Ahvaz after a fatwa of Marja al-taqlid of Najaf. In the first stage, Iranian Arabs fight with cold weapons, which led to the defeat of British Empire. In the second stage, British Empire faced Iranian Arabs with heavy firearms, but the weapons used by Iranian Arabs did not change and they faced the British Empire with cold weapons, which led to defeat of British Empire again. The tombs of Iranian Arabs killed in this battle are located 10 kilometers from Ahvaz-Susangerd.
